summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements. REQ-61 is fulfilled by adding a backend method to retrieve the canister ID and a frontend hook to query it. REQ-62 is fulfilled by creating a comprehensive DNS configuration guide component that displays the canister URL, provides Cloudflare-specific CNAME setup instructions, SSL/TLS configuration guidance, and DNS propagation information. All acceptance criteria are met with appropriate UI components, error handling, and user-friendly instructions.

hallucinated_features.description: Copy-to-clipboard functionality for canister URL with visual feedback
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request interactive clipboard copying features. The requirement specified generating a guide document with instructions, not implementing interactive UI features for copying values.

hallucinated_features.description: Loading states with animated skeleton UI for DNS guide
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request loading state handling or skeleton animations. It only requested generating a guide with the canister URL and DNS instructions.

hallucinated_features.description: Navigation menu entry for DNS Setup section
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly stated this was informational only and listed as a non-goal to avoid modifying existing configurations. Adding a permanent navigation menu item goes beyond generating a guide document.

hallucinated_features.description: Integration of DNS guide as a permanent section in main App component
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirement was to generate a comprehensive DNS configuration guide document, not to integrate it as a permanent section of the website. The guide appears to be added as a persistent section rather than a standalone document.
